preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 138.00 g of Arsenic Trioxide and place it in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 2. Add 11.98 g of Nickel(II) Oxide to the container. 
 3. Add 92.75 g of Zinc Oxide. 
 4. Use a mechanical mixer or mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the dry ingredients for at least 10 minutes until a uniform powder is achieved.
